name: Rocket Boost (Marcel)
description:
This game was created from a Udemy course and serves as a stepping stone into my future of Game Development.

The game only features 1 level and 1 test level.

Game controls:

AS- Left or right movement

SPACE - Thrust whichever way you are facing.

The Udemy course can be found here:

https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse2
